name: Amaterasu
temple_description:
Amaterasu is the head of the three great gods in Japanese mythology, the ruler of Takamagahara, and the deification of the Sun.
Born from the eye of Izanagi, she is regarded as the supreme god of Shintoism.
She provided food and silk to Ame-no-Kumahito, allowing the world to gain sericulture and arable grains.

active_skills.name: Yata no Kagami
active_skills.effect: Inflicts ignite, causing enemy to lose 4% current HP for 3 rounds

passive_skills.name: Apollo Protection
passive_skills.effect: Max HP +24%, DMG reflects to source 12%
